docTitle.titlePart:
Vibration-Rotation Interaction in the HF Mol ecul e
II. Evaluation of the r-Centroids and the Higher Terms of the Electric Dipole Moment
for Some Vibration-Rotation Bands

byline.affiliation: Laboratoire de Spectrometrie Moleculaire, Faculte des Sciences,

front.div:
The wave functions, calculated by the method described in a preceding article, are used for the
evaluation of the r-centroids relative to the 1 — 0 transition of the X
state. By means of experi-
mental line intensities, it is shown that in the expansion of the electric dipole moment, the qua-
dratic and higher terms are not negligible.
